effect_entries.effect: Protects against bullet, ball, and bomb-based moves.
effect_entries.short_effect: Protects against bullet, ball, and bomb-based moves.

flavor_text_entries.flavor_text:
たまや　ばくだんに
当たらない。

Protects the Pokémon from
some ball and bomb moves.

Protegge da alcune mosse
a base di proiettili e bombe.

No le afectan las bombas ni
algunos proyectiles.

Schützt das Pokémon vor
geworfenen Bomben und Kugeln.

Protège de certaines capacités
projetant des bombes, balles…

たまや　ばくだんに
あたらない。
